cienaCesRadiusClientMIB.name: cienaCesRadiusClientMIB

revisions.description: Updated DESCRIPTION of cienaCesRadiusUserLoginStatus, cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctStatus, cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthStatus, and cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctStatus.
Changed the RADIUS authentication string range to accept a zero length string.

Added independent Inet addressing and Unsigned32 imports. Deprecated cienaCesRadiusClientTimeout, cienaCesRadiusClientRetries, cienaCesRadiusClientAuthKey, cienaCesRadiusClientAuthKeyUnset, cienaCesRadiusClientSearchType, and cienaCesRadiusClientServerTable. Added cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTable, cienaCesRadiusDot1XAuthTable, cienaCesRadiusDot1XAcctTable
Corrected the maximum RADIUS authentication string length from 127 to 64 characters.

cienaCesRadiusClientMIB.contactinfo: Mib Meister 115 North Sullivan Road Spokane Valley, WA 99037 USA Phone: +1 509 242 9000 Email: support@ciena.com
cienaCesRadiusClientMIB.description: This module defines the objects used by the RADIUS client.

RadiusString.name: RadiusString
RadiusString.description: Used to represent the RADIUS authentication string.

cienaCesRadiusAdminState.name: cienaCesRadiusAdminState
cienaCesRadiusAdminState.description: Setting this object administratively enables or disables the RADIUS client.

cienaCesRadiusOperState.name: cienaCesRadiusOperState
cienaCesRadiusOperState.description: This object returns the operational state of the RADIUS client.

cienaCesRadiusClientTimeout.name: cienaCesRadiusClientTimeout
cienaCesRadiusClientTimeout.description: This is the time in seconds between re-transmissions to the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusClientRetries.name: cienaCesRadiusClientRetries
cienaCesRadiusClientRetries.description: Indicates the number of times the RADIUS server should be tried before giving up on the server.

cienaCesRadiusClientAuthKey.name: cienaCesRadiusClientAuthKey
cienaCesRadiusClientAuthKey.description: The authenticaion key to be used for RADIUS servers. Retrieving the value of this object via SNMP returns an empty string for security reasons.

cienaCesRadiusClientAuthKeyUnset.name: cienaCesRadiusClientAuthKeyUnset
cienaCesRadiusClientAuthKeyUnset.description: Setting this object to true clears the value of cienaCesRadiusClientAuthKey. Reading this object always returns a value of false.

cienaCesRadiusClientSearchType.name: cienaCesRadiusClientSearchType
cienaCesRadiusClientSearchType.description: This object sets the search type of the RADIUS client.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerTable.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerTable
cienaCesRadiusClientServerTable.description: Lists the possible RADIUS servers. While creating an entry, cienaCesRadiusRadiusClientServerStatus and cienaCesRadiusClientServerAddr must be specified. The SNMP multiple set operation must be used to create an entry.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerIndex.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerIndex
cienaCesRadiusClientServerIndex.description: Specifies the index of this table.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerAddr.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerAddr
cienaCesRadiusClientServerAddr.description: Host name or IP address of the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerResolvedAddr.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerResolvedAddr
cienaCesRadiusClientServerResolvedAddr.description: Specifies the resolved IP address if cienaCesRadiusClientServerAddr is set to host name. If cienaCesRadiusClientServerAddr is set to IP address, then cienaCesRadiusClientServerResolvedAddr contains the same information as cienaCesRadiusClientServerAddr.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerPriority.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerPriority
cienaCesRadiusClientServerPriority.description: Specifies the priority of RADIUS servers configured on the device.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerAuthPort.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerAuthPort
cienaCesRadiusClientServerAuthPort.description: The destination UDP port number to which RADIUS messages should be sent. The RADIUS server is not used for authentication if this port number is 0.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerRoundTripTime.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerRoundTripTime
cienaCesRadiusClientServerRoundTripTime.description: The time interval (in hundredths of a second) between the most recent Access-Reply/Access-Challenge and the Access-Request that matched it from this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessRequests.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessRequests
cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessRequests.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets sent to this server. This does not include retransmissions.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessRetransm.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessRetransmissions
cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessRetransm.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets retransmitted to this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessAccepts.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessAccepts
cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessAccepts.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Accept packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessRejects.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessRejects
cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessRejects.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Reject packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessChalleng.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessChallenges
cienaCesRadiusClientServerAccessChalleng.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Challenge packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerMalformedAcces.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerMalformedAccessResponses
cienaCesRadiusClientServerMalformedAcces.description: The number of malformed RADIUS Access-Response packets received from this server. Malformed packets include packets with an invalid length. Bad authenticators or signature attributes or unknown types are not included as malformed access responses.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerBadAuthenticat.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerBadAuthenticators
cienaCesRadiusClientServerBadAuthenticat.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Response packets containing invalid authenticators or signature attributes received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerPendingRequest.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerPendingRequests
cienaCesRadiusClientServerPendingRequest.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets destined for this server that have not yet timed out or received a response. This variable is incremented when an Access-Request is sent and decremented due to receipt of an Access-Accept, Access-Reject, Access-Challenge, a timeout, or retransmission.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerTimeouts.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerTimeouts
cienaCesRadiusClientServerTimeouts.description: The number of authentication timeouts to this server. After a timeout the client may retry sending to the same server, send to a different server, or give up. A retry to the same server is counted as a retransmit as well as a timeout. A send to a different server is counted as a request as well as a timeout.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerUnknownTypes.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerUnknownTypes
cienaCesRadiusClientServerUnknownTypes.description: The number of RADIUS packets of unknown type which were received from this server on the authentication port.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerPacketsDropped.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerPacketsDropped
cienaCesRadiusClientServerPacketsDropped.description: The number of RADIUS packets which were received from this server on the authentication port and dropped for some other reason.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerApplication.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerApplication
cienaCesRadiusClientServerApplication.description: This object specifies how the RADIUS server should be used for authentication.

cienaCesRadiusClientServerStatus.name: cienaCesRadiusClientServerStatus
cienaCesRadiusClientServerStatus.description: To create a row in this table, a manager must set this object to createAndGo(4). To create an entry, cienaCesRadiusClientServerStatus and cienaCesRadiusClientServerAddr must be specified. The SNMP multiple set operation must be used to create the entry. To disable a RADIUS server, set the cienaCesRadiusClientServerStatus object to 'notInService' state.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTimeout.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTimeout
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTimeout.description: This is the time in seconds between re-transmissions to the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRetries.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRetries
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRetries.description: Indicates the number of times the RADIUS server should be tried before giving up on the server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAuthKey.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAuthKey
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAuthKey.description: The authenticaion key to be used for RADIUS servers. Retrieving the value of this object via SNMP returns an empty string for security reasons.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginSearchType.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginSearchType
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginSearchType.description: This object sets the search type of the RADIUS client.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAuthSecret.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAuthSecret
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAuthSecret.description: Used to set the pre-encrypted secret for user-login auth. When read, this object returns the encrypted secret.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTable.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTable
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTable.description: Lists the possible RADIUS user login servers. While creating an entry, cienaCesRadiusUserLoginStatus and cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAddr must be specified. The SNMP multiple set operation must be used to create an entry.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginIndex.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginIndex
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginIndex.description: Specifies the index of this table.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddrT.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddrType
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddrT.description: Specifies the resolved IP address type. This OID is used in conjunction with cienaCesRadiusUserLoginInetAddrress. When set to : ipv4 : cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddress should be compliant with InetAddressIPv4 ipv6 : cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddress should be compliant with InetAddressIPv6

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddre.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddress
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddre.description: Specifies the resolved IP address if cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAddr is set to host name. If cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAddr is set to ip address then cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddress will contain same information as cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAddr. This OID should be used in conjuction with cienaCesRadiusUserLoginResolvedInetAddrType.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAddr.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAddr
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAddr.description: Host name or IP address of the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginPriority.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginPriority
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginPriority.description: Specifies the priority of RADIUS servers configured on the device.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAuthPort.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAuthPort
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAuthPort.description: The destination UDP port number to which RADIUS messages should be sent. The RADIUS server is not used for authentication if this port number is 0.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginClearStatistics.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginClearStatistics
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginClearStatistics.description: This object clears the statistics for a server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRoundTripTime.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRoundTripTime
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRoundTripTime.description: The time interval (in hundredths of a second) between the most recent Access-Reply/Access-Challenge and the Access-Request that matched it from this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRequests.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRequests
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRequests.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets sent to this server. This does not include retransmissions.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRetransmissions.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRetransmissions
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginRetransmissions.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets retransmitted to this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccessAccepts.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccessAccepts
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccessAccepts.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Accept packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccessRejects.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccessRejects
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccessRejects.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Reject packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccessChallenges.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccessChallenges
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccessChallenges.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Challenge packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccountingRespons.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccountingResponses
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAccountingRespons.description: The number of RADIUS Accounting-Response packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginMalformedResponse.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginMalformedResponses
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginMalformedResponse.description: The number of malformed RADIUS Access-Response packets received from this server. Malformed packets include packets with an invalid length. Bad authenticators or signature attributes or unknown types are not included as malformed access responses.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginBadAuthenticators.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginBadAuthenticators
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginBadAuthenticators.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Response packets containing invalid authenticators or signature attributes received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTimeouts.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTimeouts
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginTimeouts.description: The number of authentication timeouts to this server. After a timeout the client may retry sending to the same server, send to a different server, or give up. A retry to the same server is counted as a retransmit as well as a timeout. A send to a different server is counted as a request as well as a timeout.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginUnknownTypes.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginUnknownTypes
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginUnknownTypes.description: The number of RADIUS packets of unknown type which were received from this server on the authentication port.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginPacketsDropped.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginPacketsDropped
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginPacketsDropped.description: The number of RADIUS packets which were received from this server on the authentication port and dropped for some other reason.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginStatus.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginStatus
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginStatus.description: To create a row in this table, a manager must specify cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAddr and set this object to createAndGo(4). The RADIUS server will initially be administratively disabled. To administratively enable the RADIUS server, set this object to active(1). To administratively disable the RADIUS server set this object to notInService(2).

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAdminState.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAdminState
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAdminState.description: Setting this object administratively enables/disables the RADIUS user login accounting client on the device.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctTimeout.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctTimeout
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctTimeout.description: This is the time in seconds between re-transmissions to the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctRetries.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctRetries
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctRetries.description: Indicates the number of times the RADIUS server should be tried before giving up on the server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAuthKey.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAuthKey
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAuthKey.description: The authenticaion key to be used for RADIUS servers. Retrieving the value of this object via SNMP returns an empty string for security reasons.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctSearchType.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctSearchType
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctSearchType.description: This object sets the search type of the RADIUS client.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAuthSecret.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAuthSecret
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAuthSecret.description: Used to set the pre-encrypted secret for user-login accounting auth. When read, this object returns the encrypted secret.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctTable.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctTable
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctTable.description: Lists the possible RADIUS user login servers. While creating an entry, cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctStatus and cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAddr must be specified. The SNMP multiple set operation must be used to create an entry.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctIndex.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctIndex
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctIndex.description: Specifies the index of this table.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetA.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetAddrType
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetA.description: Specifies the resolved IP address type. This OID is used in conjunction with cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctInetAddrress. When set to : ipv4 : cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetAddress should be compliant with InetAddressIPv4 ipv6 : cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetAddress should be compliant with InetAddressIPv6

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetA.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetAddress
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetA.description: Specifies the resolved IP address if cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAddr is set to host name. If cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAddr is set to ip address then cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetAddress will contain same information as cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAddr. This OID should be used in conjuction with cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctResolvedInetAddrType.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAddr.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAddr
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAddr.description: Host name or IP address of the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctPriority.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctPriority
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctPriority.description: Specifies the priority of RADIUS servers configured on the device.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctClearStatisti.description: This object clears the statistics for a server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctRoundTripTime.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctRoundTripTime
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctRoundTripTime.description: The time interval (in hundredths of a second) between the most recent Access-Reply/Access-Challenge and the Access-Request that matched it from this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctRetransmissio.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctRetransmissions
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctRetransmissio.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets retransmitted to this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAccessAccepts.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAccessAccepts
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAccessAccepts.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Accept packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAccessRejects.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAccessRejects
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAccessRejects.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Reject packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAccessChallen.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAccessChallenges
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAccessChallen.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Challenge packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctMalformedResp.description: The number of malformed RADIUS Access-Response packets received from this server. Malformed packets include packets with an invalid length. Bad authenticators or signature attributes or unknown types are not included as malformed access responses.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctBadAuthentica.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctBadAuthenticators
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctBadAuthentica.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Response packets containing invalid authenticators or signature attributes received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctTimeouts.description: The number of authentication timeouts to this server. After a timeout the client may retry sending to the same server, send to a different server, or give up. A retry to the same server is counted as a retransmit as well as a timeout. A send to a different server is counted as a request as well as a timeout.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctUnknownTypes.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctUnknownTypes
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctUnknownTypes.description: The number of RADIUS packets of unknown type which were received from this server on the authentication port.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctPacketsDroppe.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctPacketsDropped
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctPacketsDroppe.description: The number of RADIUS packets which were received from this server on the authentication port and dropped for some other reason.

cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctStatus.name: cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctStatus
cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctStatus.description: To create a row in this table, a manager must specify cienaCesRadiusUserLoginAcctAddr and set this object to createAndGo(4). The RADIUS server will initially be administratively disabled. To administratively enable the RADIUS server, set this object to active(1). To administratively disable the RADIUS server set this object to notInService(2).

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthTimeout.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthTimeout
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthTimeout.description: This is the time in seconds between re-transmissions to the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRetries.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRetries
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRetries.description: Indicates the number of times the RADIUS server should be tried before giving up on the server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAuthKey.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAuthKey
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAuthKey.description: The authenticaion key to be used for RADIUS servers. Retrieving the value of this object via SNMP returns an empty string for security reasons.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthSearchType.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthSearchType
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthSearchType.description: This object sets the search type of the RADIUS client.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthGreylistTimeout.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthGreylistTimeout
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthGreylistTimeout.description: The max greylist timeout for a RADIUS Dot1x Auth server between 1 minute and 4 hours.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAuthSecret.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAuthSecret
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAuthSecret.description: Used to set the pre-encrypted secret for dot1x auth. When read, this object returns the encrypted secret.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthTable.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthTable
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthTable.description: Lists the possible RADIUS Dot1x auth servers. While creating an entry, cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthStatus and cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAddr must be specified. The SNMP multiple set operation must be used to create an entry.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthIndex.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthIndex
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthIndex.description: Specifies the index of this table.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthResolvedInetAddrT.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthResolvedInetAddrType
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthResolvedInetAddrT.description: Specifies the resolved IP address type. This OID is used in conjunction with cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthInetAddrress. When set to : ipv4 : cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthResolvedInetAddress should be compliant with InetAddressIPv4 ipv6 : cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthResolvedInetAddress should be compliant with InetAddressIPv6

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthResolvedInetAddre.description: Specifies the resolved IP address if cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAddr is set to host name. If cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAddr is set to ip address then cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthResolvedInetAddress will contain same information as cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAddr. This OID should be used in conjuction with cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthResolvedInetAddrType.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAddr.description: Host name or IP address of the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthPriority.description: Specifies the priority of RADIUS servers configured on the device.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAuthPort.description: The destination UDP port number to which RADIUS messages should be sent. The RADIUS server is not used for authentication if this port number is 0.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthClearStatistics.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthClearStatistics
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthClearStatistics.description: This object clears the statistics for a server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthGreylistTimeRemai.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthGreylistTimeRemaining
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthGreylistTimeRemai.description: Reflects the remaining time before the server removed from the greylist. A value of '0' (zero) indicates the current server is not greylisted

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRoundTripTime.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRoundTripTime
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRoundTripTime.description: The time interval (in hundredths of a second) between the most recent Access-Reply/Access-Challenge and the Access-Request that matched it from this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRequests.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRequests
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRequests.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets sent to this server. This does not include retransmissions.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthRetransmissions.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets retransmitted to this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccessAccepts.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Accept packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccessRejects.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccessRejects
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccessRejects.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Reject packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccessChallenges.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccessChallenges
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccessChallenges.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Challenge packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccountingRespons.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccountingResponses
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAccountingRespons.description: The number of RADIUS Accounting-Response packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthMalformedResponse.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthMalformedResponses
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthMalformedResponse.description: The number of malformed RADIUS Access-Response packets received from this server. Malformed packets include packets with an invalid length. Bad authenticators or signature attributes or unknown types are not included as malformed access responses.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthBadAuthenticators.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthBadAuthenticators
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthBadAuthenticators.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Response packets containing invalid authenticators or signature attributes received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthTimeouts.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthTimeouts
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthTimeouts.description: The number of authentication timeouts to this server. After a timeout the client may retry sending to the same server, send to a different server, or give up. A retry to the same server is counted as a retransmit as well as a timeout. A send to a different server is counted as a request as well as a timeout.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthUnknownTypes.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthUnknownTypes
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthUnknownTypes.description: The number of RADIUS packets of unknown type which were received from this server on the authentication port.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthPacketsDropped.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthPacketsDropped
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthPacketsDropped.description: The number of RADIUS packets which were received from this server on the authentication port and dropped for some other reason.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthStatus.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthStatus
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthStatus.description: To create a row in this table, a manager must specify cienaCesRadiusDot1xAuthAddr and set this object to createAndGo(4). The RADIUS server will initially be administratively disabled. To administratively enable the RADIUS server, set this object to active(1). To administratively disable the RADIUS server set this object to notInService(2).

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAdminState.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAdminState
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAdminState.description: Setting this object administratively enables/disables the RADIUS Dot1x accounting client on the device.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctTimeout.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctTimeout
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctTimeout.description: This is the time in seconds between re-transmissions to the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRetries.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRetries
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRetries.description: Indicates the number of times the RADIUS server should be tried before giving up on the server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAuthKey.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAuthKey
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAuthKey.description: The authenticaion key to be used for RADIUS servers. Retrieving the value of this object via SNMP returns an empty string for security reasons.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctSearchType.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctSearchType
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctSearchType.description: This object sets the search type of the RADIUS client.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctGreylistTimeout.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctGreylistTimeout
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctGreylistTimeout.description: The max greylist timeout for a RADIUS Dot1x Acct server between 1 minute and 4 hours.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAuthSecret.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAuthSecret
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAuthSecret.description: Used to set the pre-encrypted secret for dot1x auth acct. When read, this object returns the encrypted secret.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctTable.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctTable
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctTable.description: Lists the possible RADIUS Dot1x Acct servers. While creating an entry, cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctStatus and cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAddr must be specified. The SNMP multiple set operation must be used to create an entry.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctIndex.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctIndex
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctIndex.description: Specifies the index of this table.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddrT.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddrType
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddrT.description: Specifies the resolved IP address type. This OID is used in conjunction with cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctInetAddrress. When set to : ipv4 : cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddress should be compliant with InetAddressIPv4 ipv6 : cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddress should be compliant with InetAddressIPv6

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddre.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddress
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddre.description: Specifies the resolved IP address if cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAddr is set to host name. If cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAddr is set to ip address then cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddress will contain same information as cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAddr. This OID should be used in conjuction with cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctResolvedInetAddrType.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAddr.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAddr
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAddr.description: Host name or IP address of the RADIUS server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctPriority.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctPriority
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctPriority.description: Specifies the priority of RADIUS servers configured on the device.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAuthPort.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAuthPort
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAuthPort.description: The destination UDP port number to which RADIUS messages should be sent. The RADIUS server is not used for authentication if this port number is 0.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctClearStatistics.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctClearStatistics
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctClearStatistics.description: This object clears the statistics for a server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctGreylistTimeRemai.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctGreylistTimeRemaining
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctGreylistTimeRemai.description: Reflects the remaining time before the server removed from the greylist. A value of '0' (zero) indicates the current server is not greylisted

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRoundTripTime.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRoundTripTime
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRoundTripTime.description: The time interval (in hundredths of a second) between the most recent Access-Reply/Access-Challenge and the Access-Request that matched it from this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRequests.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRequests
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRequests.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets sent to this server. This does not include retransmissions.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRetransmissions.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRetransmissions
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctRetransmissions.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Request packets retransmitted to this RADIUS authentication server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccessAccepts.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccessAccepts
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccessAccepts.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Accept packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccessRejects.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccessRejects
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccessRejects.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Reject packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccessChallenges.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccessChallenges
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccessChallenges.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Challenge packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccountingRespons.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccountingResponses
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAccountingRespons.description: The number of RADIUS Accounting-Response packets (valid or invalid) received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctMalformedResponse.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctMalformedResponses
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctMalformedResponse.description: The number of malformed RADIUS Access-Response packets received from this server. Malformed packets include packets with an invalid length. Bad authenticators or signature attributes or unknown types are not included as malformed access responses.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctBadAuthenticators.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctBadAuthenticators
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctBadAuthenticators.description: The number of RADIUS Access-Response packets containing invalid authenticators or signature attributes received from this server.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctTimeouts.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctTimeouts
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctTimeouts.description: The number of authentication timeouts to this server. After a timeout the client may retry sending to the same server, send to a different server, or give up. A retry to the same server is counted as a retransmit as well as a timeout. A send to a different server is counted as a request as well as a timeout.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctUnknownTypes.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctUnknownTypes
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctUnknownTypes.description: The number of RADIUS packets of unknown type which were received from this server on the authentication port.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctPacketsDropped.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctPacketsDropped
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctPacketsDropped.description: The number of RADIUS packets which were received from this server on the authentication port and dropped for some other reason.

cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctStatus.name: cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctStatus
cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctStatus.description: To create a row in this table, a manager must specify cienaCesRadiusDot1xAcctAddr and set this object to createAndGo(4). The RADIUS server will initially be administratively disabled. To administratively enable the RADIUS server, set this object to active(1). To administratively disable the RADIUS server set this object to notInService(2).
